definition: The term "eigenständig" refers to the quality of being self-reliant or independent, often used to describe a person's ability to work autonomously or make decisions without external assistance. It commonly implies a sense of self-sufficiency and the capability to function effectively without relying heavily on others.

examples.german: Er arbeitet eigenständig an dem Projekt.
examples.english: He is working independently on the project.

examples.german: Die Firma hat sich eigenständig entwickelt.
Die Kinder müssen eigenständig ihre Hausaufgaben machen.
examples.english: The children have to do their homework on their own.

examples.german: Sie hat eigenständig eine Lösung gefunden.
